summary: Completed testing of UnTrash Berlin points system v5 changes. All 5 requested features verified working correctly. Backend: 8/8 tests passed. Frontend: All UI elements verified.

feature_1_report_trash_5_points.expected: points_awarded=5 and message about earning points
feature_1_report_trash_5_points.actual: Response contains points_awarded=5 and message 'Thanks for reporting! You earned 5 points.'

feature_2_collect_trash_20_points_pendin.expected: points_pending=20 and message about admin verification
feature_2_collect_trash_20_points_pendin.actual: Response contains points_pending=20 and message 'Collection submitted for admin verification'

feature_3_admin_reset_points_all_users.expected: Works for ALL users including admin users
feature_3_admin_reset_points_all_users.actual: Successfully reset points for regular users, other admin users, and self (admin resetting own points)

feature_4_delete_report_deducts_points.expected: Deducts 5 points from reporter when deleting a report
feature_4_delete_report_deducts_points.actual: Reporter points correctly deducted by 5 when report is deleted

feature_5_admin_panel_reset_button_all_u.ui_element: Admin Panel > Users tab > Reset Points button
feature_5_admin_panel_reset_button_all_u.expected: Reset Points button visible for ALL users including admin users
feature_5_admin_panel_reset_button_all_u.actual: Reset Points button visible for all 5 users including 3 admin users (Another Admin User, Test Admin User, Stephan Thurm)

test_credentials.note: Test users were created and cleaned up during testing

seed_data_creation: Test users and trash reports created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Points system v5 verified: Report=5pts (immediate), Collect=20pts (pending admin verification). Admin can reset points for ANY user including other admins and self. Delete report deducts 5 points from reporter. Notification system is MOCKED.

mocked_apis.notification_system: Email/Push notifications are logged to DB but not actually sent (send_mock_notification function)
